description: The Choir and North Ambulatory of the Church of Saint Bavo, Haarlem; Pieter Jansz. Saenredam (Dutch, 1597 - 1665); Netherlands; November 1634; Red chalk, graphite, pen and brown ink, and watercolor, incised for transfer (recto); Rubbed with black chalk for transfer (verso); 37.6 x 39.2 cm (14 13/16 x 15 7/16 in.); 88.GC.131; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
